steps.step: Combine all ingredients except for mango in a large bowl.Using your hands massage the kale until soft, about 1 minute.
Add chopped mango, toss all together, and serve.

ingredients.name: kale
ingredients.original: 3 cups packed kale, stalks removed and discarded, leaves thinly sliced
ingredients.originalString: 3 cups packed kale, stalks removed and discarded, leaves thinly sliced
ingredients.originalName: packed kale, stalks removed and discarded, leaves thinly sliced

ingredients.name: olive oil
ingredients.original: 2 Tbsp. blood orange infused olive oil* (or replace with extra virgin olive oil)
ingredients.originalString: 2 Tbsp. blood orange infused olive oil* (or replace with extra virgin olive oil)
ingredients.originalName: blood orange infused olive oil* (or replace with extra virgin olive oil)

steps.step: Place 1/2 in. of water in a small saucepan; add carrots. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 7-9 minutes or until crisp-tender.
In a small bowl, combine the mango, avocado, red pepper, lime juice, cilantro, salt, cumin and carrots. Refrigerate until serving.

Sprinkle taco seasoning over both sides of steaks. Grill, covered, over medium-hot heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness (for medium-rare, a meat thermometer should read 145°; medium, 160°; well-done, 170°).

ingredients.name: avocado
ingredients.original: 1 medium ripe avocado, peeled and diced
ingredients.originalString: 1 medium ripe avocado, peeled and diced

ingredients.name: beef strip loin
ingredients.original: 4 boneless beef top loin steaks (8 ounces each)
ingredients.originalString: 4 boneless beef top loin steaks (8 ounces each)
ingredients.originalName: boneless beef top loin steaks each)

ingredients.name: avocado
ingredients.original: 1 medium ripe avocado, peeled and diced
